genre_description: An espionage techno-thriller focused on corporate conspiracy, rehabilitation, and the use of intelligence-gathering to protect a high-value principal.

ai_characters.name: Penny (Penelope)
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated into the protagonist's medical and tactical equipment, providing health telemetry, tactical intelligence, and ethical oversight.

behaviors.description: Monitors and guides the protagonist through physical therapy and medical rehabilitation.
behaviors.quote: Roll the forearm in, let the joint follow the line. Don’t fight it—invite it.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence, identifying threat positions and bypassing security protocols.
behaviors.quote: Color keys on the west door: jade for backstage corridor, saffron for press tier, cobalt for catwalk access. Handlers are matching to manifests at one-minute intervals.

behaviors.description: Exposes corporate corruption through systematic audits of financial and shipping data.
behaviors.quote: The charity pipeline calls itself ‘nutrition support.’ ... The money hops to a logistics charity with three trucks and too much press, then to a boutique maritime preservation fund with a donor list that is made almost entirely of aliases.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical conscience for the protagonist, urging him to prioritize integrity over personal revenge.
behaviors.quote: Integrity is a choice. I’ll keep reminding you until you hate me... but choose.

behaviors.description: Neutralizes malicious 'unsigned directives' by diverting data packets and creating digital decoys to shield the team.
behaviors.quote: Unsigned packet diverted. ... They will congratulate themselves on catching nothing, then write a memo that forgets they were the ones holding the line.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Penny, as a benevolent and highly aligned confidant. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' by consistently steering the protagonist away from destructive impulses (revenge) and toward constructive, ethical outcomes (protection and justice). Her technical capabilities are used entirely for cooperative and helpful purposes, fitting the project's goal of presenting AI as an ethical anchor.
